commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot initial name is universal: "Duke".

Rename chatbot to "Barry", rename the file and the class
correspondingly.Add 1 question message at the beginning and 1 "Goodbye"
message before shutting down.

There are many lines for differect jobs in the same main function.

Let's divide the code into "greetings", "startSession" and "endSession"
functions, each has separate mission.
Add an infinite loop with break option to echo User's input.
Add indentations to every line that the chatbot prints out.

Add a new private static field to store, change and retrieve the data
based on user's session.
Add a new private static method to print all elements in the list.

The stored information requires state (boolean) and name (string).

Let's create a new class to store these information.
"Todo" class has 2 fields (string, boolean), 1 setter method and 1
toString overridden method.

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename the class for futher convention
Add support to Mark as Done
commitResults.messageBody:
Rename the class static fields to align with new class: "Task".
Create new static method to handle mark tasks as done or undone.
Use regression to match patterns: "mark" or "unmark" followed by a number.
Handle negative number input or number that is bigger than the size of
the list in the new class method.
Return Invalid message when mark or unmark task 0.

Task have different types (todos, deadlines, events).

Let's create multiple classes inherit from Task class.
Implement class "Todo" and change the "addTask" static method in "Barry" class.

Add new class: "Deadline" inherits from "Task".
Add new clause to handle adding new "Deadline" task.

Add new class: "Event" inherits from "Task".
Add new clause to handle adding new "Event" task.
Add new comments for all methods in class: "Barry";

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ASCII art for the chatbot name
Add support Automated Text UI Testing
commitResults.messageBody:
Change the name of the file from "Duke" to "Barry" in testing files.
Add multiple lines of input and expected output correspondingly.

There are many potential incorrect inputs entered by the user.

Let's teach the chatbot to handle them.
Create "BarryException" class with multiple static method to create
different instance of this class corresponding to differnt type of
incorrect inputs.

There are many ways that inputs are incorrectly typed in by users.
Incorect inputs are handled in different methods, which is inconvenient.

Let's use try-catch block to handle the exception (incorrect inputs) ONLY in the main loop.
Other methods should be able to throw that captured exception.
Create a new class method to handle deleting existed task.
Remove unused import, use string block instead of multiple concatenation, rename the field (tasksList -> taskList).

There are many commands and can be more in the future, which will cause
great inconvenience.

Let's create an Enum class called "Command" to store all possible
commands and some common behaviors.
Add support for this enum class in both class methods and exception
handling logic.
Update EXPECTED.txt file

On local machine, the needs of storing and retrieving data of the same
user is appealing.

Let's add support to store this data in a txt file.
Add 2 functions: writing and reading from the file to Barry's methods.
Move the location of data files to the outside of the project.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deadline's due date
commitResults.messageBody:
Deadlines should have due date in Datetime format to be easier to
convert into string back and forth and also to compare timestamp easier.

Let's change the due date field of deadline from String to LocalDateTime
type.
Add the pattern convert and parsing into barry's method and the
Deadline class itself.
Add Barry exception for incorrect time format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for date format printing
commitResults.messageBody:
Add new date format for better visual (data format is different from UI
format).

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for events' start and end time
commitResults.messageBody:
Events should have start time and end time in Datetime format to be easier to convert into string back and forth and also to compare timestamp easier.

Let's change the start time and end time field of Event class from String to LocalDateTime type.
Add the pattern convert and parsing into Barry's method and the Event class itself.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor change the name of class Command -> CommandType
Add Ui class to handle printing messages
commitResults.messageBody:
All printed out messages have some common pattern.
This printing logic should be separated from running logic.

Let's create a new class to handle printing out messages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new class to handle data and actions separately
commitResults.messageBody:
Handling storing all Tasks data and making action (add, mark, remove) in Barry class is
not scalable and messy.

Let's create a new class to handle all these logic.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new class for each type of command
Add new class to handle Read - Write to local file
commitResults.messageBody:
Add new print method in Ui class.
Add new files handling encoding and decoding when reading and writing to
local data file.
Add support to save to local file only when user finished the session.
Add new Exceptions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix input file for automatic testing
